page.title: 18Stevenage New Town
page.content: Stevenage is a new town. The part we have investigated is mostly housing but some land is used for agriculture and there is an 18 hole council owned golf course too. This part of Stevenage has been built in the last twenty-five years and some parts are very recent. Most of the houses were built by the council. It is planned carefully to be as attractive as possible. There are lots of open spaces and parks and the council plants trees and shrubs and keeps the town clean. The town is designed for safety. Cycle tracks follow most of the main roads and there are many underpasses and pedestrian crossings. Each neighbourhood has its own shops. The shops might include a supermarket, chemist, newsagents, hairdressers and takeaway food shops.
